refnamediv.refpurpose: Calls seq function defined on R which takes min, max value and step size as input parameters and the result is a sequence of values from min to max with the given step size

listitem.para: min : the minimum value of the sequence
max : the maximum value of the sequence
step : the step size of the sequence

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calls the seq() function in R which takes min, max value and step size as input parameters and the result is a sequence of values from min to max value with the given step size.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // seq on min, max and step y = seq(1,5,0.5)

simplelist.member: Mohana N (Assistant Professor, SAS, Division of Mathematics, VIT Chennai)
